articles.title: The Guardian pulls transphobic line from Sex Education review - PinkNews
articles.description: The Guardian have removed a transphobic sentence from a review of the final series of Sex Education which references "healthy bodies".
articles.content:
The Guardian have removed a transphobic sentence from a review of the final series of Sex Education. 
The review, written by columnist Lucy Mangan, was published on Thursday (21 September), the same… [+4233 chars]
